explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes an online sequential learning model (OS-GELM) that extends the online sequential extreme learning machine (OS-ELM), which is a machine learning technique.
explanations.neural network: The model uses an online sequential extreme learning machine (OS-ELM), which is a type of neural network with randomly selected hidden nodes and analytically determined output weights.
explanations.hidden layer: The paper mentions that the parameters of hidden nodes in the OS-GELM model are randomly selected, indicating the presence of a hidden layer in the neural network architecture.
